TopicTitle: Achievements on TrueAchievements for KSP Steam

Articles.Content:
There are https://www.trueachievements.com/game/Kerbal-Space-Program/achievements,

how to make it work on Win10 KSP Steam version? 

Should a Win10-XBox-app layout be summoned by Win+G on KSP?

KSP is not an "Xbox One + Windows 10" title, so any Xbox achievements would not be unlockable on PC. The best you can hope for is for Steam achievements to someday be implemented, but that hasn't happened yet (as far as I'm aware -- I don't have the Steam version).
then why there is KSP with achievements on TrueAchievements? (KSP Enhanced Edition on a different page on TrueAchievements)

2 hours ago, flart said:

then why there is KSP with achievements on TrueAchievements? (KSP Enhanced Edition on a different page on TrueAchievements)

That was the first iteration of the console release, iirc based on 1.0.5, and still under the Deported banner.

Enhanced Edition was the second iteration, based on 1.2.2, and under TTI as a new publisher.
